scripts.say: Canal Stronghold Bay
Man, this canal really is a feat of engineering, any way you look at it.
I'm totally speechless after seeing it in person. I know what I'm going to post about on Juustagram after I get back.
I heard that this played an important role in staving off the Sirens in the past.
In order to get across this little strip of land, people used to have to sail around the entire continent.
It only makes sense to continually expand and renovate the stronghold that protects this all-important canal.
And, that's the reason why we're here to protect this fortress. I can see why Baltimore was so pumped up about this.
Getting pumped up is a good thing. A superhero doesn't get to pick her battles!
From searching for lost cats to defeating nefarious villains, we've gotta do everything in our power to be humanity's best neighbors!
"Siren forces have been detected in the waters around the Canal Stronghold! All hands, prepare for battle immediately!"
"Repeat, Siren forces have surrounded us! Prepare for battle immediately!"
What...?
Damn, those villains sure know how to ruin the moment...
If we lose control of this route, human civilization may very well backslide.
Casablanca, please focus on evacuating the transport ships in the bay. Reno, I'll leave the anti-air to you.
Understood!
Bremerton, come with me. We're going to hunt some Sirens.
...What are you looking at?
Nothing in particular. You might have one hell of an evil eye, but even you know how to bust out the cool lines when it matters.
But, taking on the Sirens, huh? That's just the exercise I was itching for!
Heheh, let's dance until you can't move anymore!
